price: São mortos, não vivos. E não percebem quando serão ressuscitados.
arabic: أَمۡوَٰتٌ غَيۡرُ أَحۡيَآءٖۖ وَمَا يَشۡعُرُونَ أَيَّانَ يُبۡعَثُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: amwātun ghayru aḥyāin wamā yashʿurūna ayyāna yub'ʿathūna
